title: Attendance
content: How strict is the 85 percent attendance rule ? If we maintain our attendance around 80, is it enough for writing esa ?

comments.body: Ya it's enough. I had dot 80% in Mechanics SEM 1
Perhaps, last sem they were lenient as it was 1st sem

It depends if you're in ece or cs. I'm in ece and I had my attendance in 50s in Sem 3 and 4 and they didn't really care or ask me anything. I believe they ask for affidavit and medical certificate for cs ppl
And for 2nd sem,where we are a part of the science and humanities department ?
I'm not too sure as we had 90+ becauase it was online. But usually S&H is really chill
Wait 50's?? And still they let you write esa??
Yeah I had already got my hall ticket by the time they released the attendance list so it was peaceful only
better to say you were lucky that time..
nah, i confirm i had 50s too and wrote exams this time i have 40s also still havent been asked anything
Thats a good news though.. Since I too am from ECE dept
The attendance form for club states that the attendance should be above 80% and 70% even with club shit so 80 above is fine they tell 85 for safer side
I garduated 10 years back. Great to see some problems are constant, lol.
